channel.title: What should I use my PC for?
channel.description:
Hey Mopar. I have a new computer, running Windows 7. I was just wondering, if this was your PC, what would you use it for?
Processor: AMD Athlon(tm) Processor LE-1640 2.70Ghz 2.00 GB RAM (1.75) usuable System Type: 64-bit
[URL=http://imgur.com/9LQt4Zk][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9LQt4Zk.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: What should I use my PC for?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

watch adult entertainment?

but no seriously, with only 2gb and windows 7… your options are…well already pretty darn slim. basic operations such as what jmood has stated is about all it can do for the most part.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I use my PC for?

item.title: What should I use my PC for?

item.title: What should I use my PC for?
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

I currently use it to code my 317 Allstar base server. Seems to run pretty well for that. I also edit videos on this pc with no problem at all.

item.title: What should I use my PC for?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Not like you will be able to do much with it other than surf the web and use it for writing papers and stuff.

item.title: What should I use my PC for?

it’s a computer. I’d use it for whatever I plan on doing.

item.source: What should I use my PC for?

item.title: What should I use my PC for?
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

Justin Bieber:

I’d use it as a welcome kiosk in my foyer, with stuff like a guestbook that visitors can sign and also live information on the house (power consumption, cars available, people inside, rooms in use, etc…).

I can’t tell if you are being sarcastic… Anyways, please reply with what you would honestly use this computer for.
Example, hosting, coding, video editing, picture editing, etc

Read full topic
item.source: What should I use my PC for?
